last_episode_to_air.name: Episode 24: Dumplings II/Bacon and Eggs
last_episode_to_air.overview: Still wrestling with their new forms, the crew must overcome the gargoyles. Later, they descend deeper into the dungeon. What monsters will they try next?

name: Delicious in Dungeon
overview: Dungeons, dragons... and delicious monster stew!? Adventurers foray into a cursed buried kingdom to save their friend, cooking up a storm along the way.

episodes.name: Episode 1: Hot Pot/Tart
episodes.overview: After a crushing loss, Laios, Marcille, and Chilchuck quickly reenter the dungeon to save Falin, but this time, they have a foolproof survival plan.

episodes.name: Episode 2: Roast Basilisk/Omelet/Kakiage
episodes.overview: After waking up to a tantalizing smell, Marcille receives a lecture from Senshi on a balanced diet. The crew helps an adventurer poisoned by a basilisk.

episodes.name: Episode 3: Living Armor
episodes.overview: Laios and crew access a hidden area guarded by mysterious Living Armor, who appear to be protecting something potentially delicious.

episodes.name: Episode 4: Stewed Cabbage/Orcs
episodes.overview: Reaching the third level of the dungeon, Senshi leads the crew to his secret vegetable garden. Later, they are accosted by a band of angry, desperate orcs.

episodes.name: Episode 5: Snacks/Sorbet
episodes.overview: As another group of adventurers discovers a treasure box, a swarm of bone-chilling ghosts chases Laios and his crew. Senshi, however, has a sweet plan.

episodes.name: Episode 6: Court Cuisine/Boiled in Salt Water
episodes.overview: A starving Laios angers a mysterious elf while hunting for food in Living Paintings. Later, Chilchuck finds himself trapped with a crabby Mimic.

episodes.name: Episode 7: Kelpie/Porridge/Broiled with Sauce
episodes.overview: Something's fishy on this new dungeon level! The crew crosses a treacherous lake, encountering vicious seafood and fallen adventurers along the way.

episodes.name: Episode 8: Raspberries/Grilled Meat
episodes.overview: Marcille recalls when she first met Falin as young students. After a quick wash up, an inadvertent misstep lands her in deep water with an angry spirit.

episodes.name: Episode 9: Tentacles/Stew
episodes.overview: The smell of meat lures in uninvited guests — among them, a familiar face emerges. To move forward, they must work together to defeat the Undine.

episodes.name: Episode 10: Giant Frogs/Aboveground
episodes.overview: The crew avoid a stinging descent to the castle town, where the Red Dragon lurks. But to defeat it, they need a tight plan — and a morale-boosting meal.

episodes.name: Episode 11: Red Dragon I
episodes.overview: The crew finally faces the Red Dragon, but their grand strategy quickly unravels. With the beast's fury escalating, who will get the final bite?

episodes.name: Episode 12: Red Dragon II
episodes.overview: A desperate search within the dragon's stomach leads to a gruesome discovery, revealing that resurrection magic alone won't be enough to restore Falin.

episodes.name: Episode 13: Red Dragon III/Good Medicine
episodes.overview: Falin starts acting strange in the middle of the night, leading Laios and crew to a menacing figure who wants them gone.

episodes.name: Episode 14: Sea Serpent
episodes.overview: Back in an upper dungeon level, Kabru and crew wake up to find their supplies missing and are ambushed on their way back to the surface.

episodes.name: Episode 15: Dryad/Cockatrice
episodes.overview: Trapped in the dungeon, a concerned Senshi cooks up a nourishing meal for the famished crew — giving Marcille enough energy to come up with a plan.

episodes.name: Episode 16: Cleaners/Dried with Sweet Sake
episodes.overview: Chilchuck figures out a way to escape the dungeon, but their ascent is halted by an unexpected encounter with an old friend in dire need of sustenance.

episodes.name: Episode 17: Harpy/Chimera
episodes.overview: The parties must band together to fend off an attack by vicious Harpies — but the unexpected appearance of a transformed Falin stuns everyone.

episodes.name: Episode 18: Shapeshifter
episodes.overview: While in pursuit of Falin, Laios and crew seek shelter from a blizzard but are overrun by Shapeshifter copies of themselves. How will they spot the fakes?

episodes.name: Episode 19: Hag/Nightmare
episodes.overview: The crew is cornered by an acquaintance who demands help with a beastly problem. Later, Laios enters Marcille's nightmare and discovers her greatest fear.

episodes.name: Episode 20: Ice Golem/Barometz
episodes.overview: Izutsumi proves to be a useful ally despite her lousy table manners — and aversion to eating monsters. But the crew's kindness slowly opens her up.

episodes.name: Episode 21: Egg/The Golden Country
episodes.overview: With the dungeon's fate hanging in the balance, Kabru negotiates with the elves. Meanwhile, a ghost drags Laios and crew into the cursed Golden Country.

episodes.name: Episode 22: Griffin/Familiars
episodes.overview: Leaving the safety of the Golden Country, Senshi ends up in the clutches of a ferocious griffin. The crew must summon help if they want to save him.

episodes.name: Episode 23: Griffin Soup/Dumplings I
episodes.overview: Back at camp, Senshi finally reveals his painful history with the dungeon. The next day, the crew is rudely awakened by a perplexing transformation.

episodes.name: Episode 24: Dumplings II/Bacon and Eggs
episodes.overview: Still wrestling with their new forms, the crew must overcome the gargoyles. Later, they descend deeper into the dungeon. What monsters will they try next?
